creator: RV Games
descriptionHtml:
Discover the world of sea and experience the adventure filled shark attacks in "Hungry Scary Shark Attack 3D : Shark Games 2021" – one of the best shark games on Play Store.

In this addictive and scary shark game, you'll get a chance to become a shark and get an inside look at the wonders of the underwater world!

Grow in size and show your shark bite stamina to hunt down large crowds of ocean animals. Choose from a collection of fast and megamouth shark species for the shark attack simulation in the best shark game. Visit different oceans to satisfy your hunger and experience the underwater adventure all for free.

This fantastic ocean hunting high-end shark simulator game offers you a chance to experience the underwater world and dive into the incredible hunting adventure. Dynamic shadows, hi-resolution textures and realistic shark models all combined in one game to make this a thrilling experience for you!

With "Hungry Scary Shark Attack 3D : Shark Games 2021", get ready to enjoy the best underwater game that you can even play offline! Are you ready to have lots of fun? Then stop looking for other 3D games, this action packed shark simulator is for you!

HUNGRY SCARY SHARK ATTACK FEATURES
- Realistic shark models with amazing animations
- High-quality graphics and special effects
- Awesome gameplay with shark attack animations
- Many thrilling levels in a deep ocean environment
- Smooth and easy to play controls
descriptionShort: Play Under the sea, attack people as a scary hungry shark & make them SCREAM!
